short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool for generating strong and secure passwords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool for creating strong and secure passwords

With this extension, you can easily create strong and secure passwords. You can specify the length of the password and the characters used (lowercase, uppercase, numbers or special characters). You can copy the generated password directly to the clipboard.

Advantages:
- Generating passwords with a large number of options.
- Saving password configuration settings and extensions.
- Option that can be changed - saving the history of generated passwords when copying them.
